title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI's - Italy - Torre Della Pelosa
description:
In this video we will fly over the Torre Della Pelosa. The Pelosa tower is a tower that is part of the complex of fortified structures that, from the early Middle Ages until the mid-nineteenth century, constituted the defensive, sighting and communication system of the coastal strip of Sardinia
